description: Try our easy to follow Pea Dip With Crispy Falafel recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pea Dip With Crispy Falafel Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Slice half the radishes. Serve pea dip with falafel (halved, if desired), radish, extra mint leaves, a drizzle of oil and lemon wedges.
Slice half the radishes. Serve pea dip with falafel (halved, if desired), radish, extra mint leaves, a drizzle of oil and lemon wedges.
